overview: Whore It Up from Digital Playground director Robby D. features Rio Valentine and her mansion full of incredibly lustful vixens. Three horny guys in search of an endless night of sex and surprises arrive at the house where Rio Valentine and her seductresses are ready and willing to fulfill their every fantasy. Ranging from intimate Boy / Girl scenes to full cast orgies, this work features 11 slutty girls, and 8 sexually satisfying scenes for both cast and viewers. There is no shortage of pleasure once the guys give themselves into submission...as only the girls of Digital Playground know how to provide.
title: Whore It Up
